title: Mountain Pro Shell Jacket
content: Stay protected in extreme conditions with our Mountain Pro Shell Jacket. This premium technical outerwear piece features a waterproof, breathable membrane, fully sealed seams, and adjustable hood. Perfect for mountaineering, skiing, and severe weather adventures. Includes pit zips for ventilation and multiple secure pockets for essential gear.

image.promptForImage: Professional product photography of a high-end technical mountain shell jacket in deep blue color against white background, showing front view with all zippers and features visible, commercial quality, high resolution
image.alt: Mountain Pro Shell Jacket in deep blue, showing front view with technical features like waterproof zippers, adjustable hood, and multiple pockets
